Detailed Description

This class is used for randomized hough transform to store accumulator cells in a sparse space.

This class use a 1D-vector-list structure to store cells. Used internally by CHoughRHTLine.

See also:
CHoughRHTLine
This class is part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.
Author:
Qinyin Zhou <qinyin@mip.sdu.dk>
Version:
0.99

Constructor.

Makes a space of desired size.

Parameters:
os  Output stream.
ImageWidth  Width of the source image.
ImageHeight  Height of the source image.
Thickness  Thickness of lines appeared in image.
Parameter  space threshold.
ParamType  Type of parameter. Normal parameterization as default.

Initializes CSparseHoughSpace2D specified for an image and type of parametrization..

Creates a two dimensional Hough space object.

Parameters:
mageWidth  Width of the source image object.
mageHeight  Height of the source image object.
Thickness  Thickness of the lines of the source image.
Threshold  Peak detection threshold.
ParamType  Type of parametrization, slope intercept or normal parametrization. Normal parameterization method is set as default.

void ipl::CSparseHoughSpace2D::ToImage (  CStdImage &    OutputImg )  [virtual]
 

Convert the Hough space into an image object.

Only 2D Hough space can result in a successfull writing. Overload parent class method.
